panel.label: Info
panel.name: support_panel
panel.text: For the latest information about Firestorm, visit http://www.phoenixviewer.com

panel.label: Linden Lab Credits
panel.name: credits_panel
panel.text:
Firestorm would not be possible without the decision from Linden Lab to make their Second Life viewer source code available.
The Lindens are:

panel.label: Firestorm Credits
panel.name: fs_credits_panel
panel.text:
Firestorm is a community development project to improve the SecondLife(tm) Viewer experience. We package contributions from various community developers along with code from Linden Lab and ourselves to bring you a quality, feature-rich viewer experience backed up by a large volunteer support team. Firestorm is brought to you by The Phoenix Viewer Project, Inc., a non-profit organization.
The Firestorm Development Team:
panel.text_editor: LordGregGreg Back, Kitty Barnett, Kadah Coba, Nicky Dasmijn, Tankmaster Finesmith, Ansariel Hiller, Selo Jacobus, WoLf Loonie, Techwolf Lupindo, Jessica Lyon, Wolfspirit Magic, Arrehn Oberlander, Liny Odell, Zi Ree, Mobius Ryba, Vortex Saito, Tonya Souther, Tozh Taurog and Armin Weatherwax.
panel.text: Additional code generously contributed to Firestorm by:
panel.text_editor: Satomi Ahn, Katharine Berry, Alexie Birman, nhede Core, Lance Corrimal, Fractured Crystal, NiranV Dean, Sunset Faulkes, Whirly Fizzle, Holy Gavenkrantz, Dawa Gurbux, Albatroz Hird, Vaalith Jinn, Zwagoth Klaar, Kool Koolhoven, Shyotl Kuhr, Nogardrevlis Lectar, Melancholy Lemon, Miguael Liamano, Sione Lomu, Peyton Menges, Nagi Michinaga, Kittin Ninetails, Mimika Oh, Andromeda Rage, f0rbidden, programmtest, Mysty Saunders, Thickbrick Sleaford, Hitomi Tiponi, Qwerty Venom, Shin Wasp, Armin Weatherwax, Chalice Yao, Damian Zhaoying and others.
panel.text: Special thanks to our Firestorm Support Team, wiki editors, educators, and translators:
panel.text_editor: Mister Acacia, AngelBlack123 Akins, Anubi Alter, Atthosz Amiot, Sabah Back, Poledra Behemoth, Nano Bouscario, Thea Brianna, Norton Burns, Afrika Burton, JogiTE Clip, Miro Collas, Flandria Connolly, SaHaRa Connor, silvanaf Demina, Basement Desade, Hope Dreier, Ayelin Ethaniel, Sunset Faulkes, TankMaster Finesmith, Whirly Fizzle, RINOBIT Footman, Spino Forcella, Erick Gregan, Roth Grut, Riku Highfield, Albatroz Hird, XLR8RRICK Hudson, Chymy India, Selo Jacobus, Eressea Karsin, Kool Koolhoven, Toy LaFollette, PixelProphet Lane, Lalwende Leakey, NogarDrevlis Lectar, Landaree Levee, Tanja Levenque, AnaLucia Loon, Wolfspirit Magic, Christy Mansbridge, Nisa Maverick, Gee McAuley, narcisssia McMahon, Ed Merryman, Lyn Mimistrobell, DARK Mirabella, Valeries Muircastle, Ricky Munz, Peewee Musytari, Marybeth Oceanlane, Lette Ponnier, Patience Porta, Mickeala Praga, Lina Pussycat, Jotunn Qi, Annuccia Resident, F0RBIDDEN Resident, PanteraPolnocy Resident, Programmtest Resident, AleiaSerenity Sapphire, Mysty Saunders, Bia Scribe, alison Seesaw, Robert0 Siamendes, Sniper Siemans, FreeSpirit Simmering, Pisano Smit, Fabry String, Srilania Svoboda, Rander Teskat, Kosmox Voom, Annuccia Vuckovic, Franklyn Watanabe, Morgause Whiteberry, Toy Wylie and Damian Zhaoying.
panel.text:
Firestorm includes Starlight, modified for Firestorm. It is provided by residents for residents, with the intention of providing an alternative, brighter, and hopefully easier to use interface. For further details see <nolink>https://wiki.secondlife.com/wiki/Viewer_Skins/Starlight</nolink>.
UI Artists and Designers:
panel.text_editor: Hitomi Tiponi, KirstenLee Cinquetti, Alexandrea Fride, psi Merlin, Hugh Helendale, samm florian, Digital Scribe, Naomah Beaumont, Nadin, Sammie Benoir, Mobius Ryba, DarkAgent Baphomet
